get.summary: 내 예약/취소 상세 조회 (인증 후, 보류)

get.description: userId, userName, userNickname, userGrade는 모두 토큰에 담겨서 들어갑니다. 프론트가 알아서 뜯어야합니다.

post.description: 사용자 - 출항 일정 상세 조회 재활용

patch.description: 예약 취소는 관리자 입금확인/취소 접수/취소 완료와 같이 사용

get.description:
만약 11월 11일 오후 7시 -> 11월 12일 출항 시간 띄어줌
11월 11일 오전 3시 -> 11월 11일 출항 시간 띄어줌
기준은 schedule의 시간

get.summary: 배 리스트 조회 / 스케쥴 생성할 때 필요한 조회

get.description: 배 상세조회는 필요 없어서 배 리스트 조회와 합치겠습니다.

put.description: 출항 일정 수정 <- 없애고 출항 일정 생성으로 퉁

post.description: 쿠폰은 예약 하나하나에 대해서만 발급 가능

patch.description:
예약자 - 취소 접수
관리자 - 입금확인/취소 완료로 변경 가능

x-apifox-enum.name: MONDAY
x-apifox-enum.description:
The singleton instance for the day-of-week of Monday.
This has the numeric value of{@code 1}.

x-apifox-enum.name: TUESDAY
x-apifox-enum.description:
The singleton instance for the day-of-week of Tuesday.
This has the numeric value of{@code 2}.

x-apifox-enum.name: WEDNESDAY
x-apifox-enum.description:
The singleton instance for the day-of-week of Wednesday.
This has the numeric value of{@code 3}.

x-apifox-enum.name: THURSDAY
x-apifox-enum.description:
The singleton instance for the day-of-week of Thursday.
This has the numeric value of{@code 4}.

x-apifox-enum.name: FRIDAY
x-apifox-enum.description:
The singleton instance for the day-of-week of Friday.
This has the numeric value of{@code 5}.

x-apifox-enum.name: SATURDAY
x-apifox-enum.description:
The singleton instance for the day-of-week of Saturday.
This has the numeric value of{@code 6}.

x-apifox-enum.name: SUNDAY
x-apifox-enum.description:
The singleton instance for the day-of-week of Sunday.
This has the numeric value of{@code 7}.

writeBuffer.description: Temporary buffer used to hold writes of strings and single characters

lock.description:
The object used to synchronize operations on this stream.  For
efficiency, a character-stream object may use an object other than
itself to protect critical sections.  A subclass should therefore use
the object in this field rather than{@code this} or a synchronized
method.

skipLF.description: If the next character is a line feed, skip it

markedSkipLF.description: The skipLF flag when the mark was set

outputWriter.description: Readers and Writers created for this process; so repeated calls return the same object
